00027 class rlDataAcquisitionProvider
00028 {
00029 public:
00030   // shared memory header
00031   typedef struct
00032   {
00033     char ident[4];          // must be "daq"
00034     int  maxItemNameLength; // maximum length of an item name
00035     int  maxNameLength;     // maximum length of the item value
00036     int  numItems;          // number of items in shared memory
00037     int  readErrorCount;    // 0...65536 incremented by each read error
00038     int  writeErrorCount;   // 0...65536 incremented by each write error
00039     int  spare[8];          // for future use
00040     char cspare[32];        // for future use
00041   }SHM_HEADER;
00042   
00043   enum DAQ_PROVIDER_ENUM
00044   {
00045     DAQ_PROVIDER_ERROR = 256*256*128
00046   };
00047 
00048 #ifdef RLWIN32  
00049   rlDataAcquisitionProvider(int maxNameLength=31, const char *shared_memory="c:\\automation\\shm\\dataacquisition.shm", long shared_memory_size=65536);
00050 #else
00051   rlDataAcquisitionProvider(int maxNameLength=31, const char *shared_memory="/srv/automation/shm/dataacquisition.shm", long shared_memory_size=65536);
00052 #endif
00053   virtual    ~rlDataAcquisitionProvider();
00054   int         readItemList(const char *filename); // return DAQ_PROVIDER_ERROR | num_items
00055   const char *firstItem();
00056   const char *nextItem();
00057   const char *stringValue(const char *variable);
00058   int         intValue(const char *variable);
00059   float       floatValue(const char *variable);
00060   int         setStringValue(const char *variable, const char *value);
00061   int         setIntValue(const char *variable, int value);
00062   int         setFloatValue(const char *variable, float value);
00063   int         readErrorCount();
00064   int         writeErrorCount();
00065   int         setReadErrorCount(int count);
00066   int         setWriteErrorCount(int count);
00067   int         shmStatus(); // 0 if shared memory is ok | DAQ_PROVIDER_ERROR if shared memory is not ok
00068   int         setAllowAddValues(int allow, int maxItemNameLength);
00069 
00070 private:
00071   SHM_HEADER     *shmheader;
00072   char           *shmvalues;
00073   int             current_item, allow_add_values;
00074   rlSharedMemory *shm;
00075   long            sharedMemorySize;
00076 };
